n. frustration with how long it takes to get to know someoneâspending the first few weeks chatting in their psychological entryway, with each subsequent conversation like entering a different anteroom, each a little closer to the center of the houseâwishing…

Would this work for any of you? I think I’d prefer to work my way in, but now I’m questioning why I think that way is “normal” and not the other way around.
